description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Arrival of Korean mine-workers in Germany to begin a three year working stay and a state visit to Germany by Korean President Chung Hee Park; Berlin's ring road system; the Institute for Aircraft Construction in Berlin's Technical University; the old town of Celle with its traditional medieval buildings and way of life; soccer being played in the snow; ice skating; ski racing and ski jumping contests.
